summary: This document is an email chain from May 2020 discussing the logistics of submitting a renewal for a Non-Disclosure Order (NDO) related to the Epstein case. The emails involve coordination between legal or law enforcement personnel regarding the proper protocol and submission to magistrate court.

events.title: NDO renewal submission coordination
events.description: An email discusses submitting a Non-Disclosure Order renewal for the Epstein case to magistrate court, noting it will be included in the afternoon batch and that judges are on a schedule of 10am and 3pm.

events.title: Pen register application inquiry
events.description: An email inquires if the recipient is the right person for pen register applications going to magistrate court, mentioning an attached application for the next day.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from April to May 2020 regarding legal procedures in the Epstein case.
It references a renewal of a Non-Disclosure Order (NDO) related to the Epstein case.
It mentions a pen register application being prepared for submission to magistrate court.
The emails indicate ongoing legal or investigative activity in the Epstein case in mid-2020.
All personal names and email addresses in the document are redacted.
